special_attacks: channel negative energy (DC 16, 5d6), smite good 4/day (+1 attack and AC, +10 damage)

spells.antipaladin spells prepared:
(CL 7th; concentration +8)

2nd-bull's strength

1st-doom (DC 12), litany of sloth, protection from good

other_gear: +1 full plate, +1 human-bane falchion, belt of mighty constitution +2, cloak of resistance +1, 125 gp
feats: Cleave, Great Cleave, Improved Critical (falchion), Iron Will, Power Attack, Weapon Focus (falchion)

sections.body:
Before Combat The ravager casts bull's strength on himself.

Base Statistics Without bull's strength, the ravager's base statistics are

Melee +1 human-bane falchion +17/+12/+7 (2d4+7/15–20)

Str 19

CMB +15

CMD 25.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Gnoll clerics, devoted to the goddess of monsters, serve the pack by culling the weak and enforcing pack hierarchy.

special_qualities: cruelties (fatigued, nauseated, staggered), fiendish boon (weapon +2, 2/day), touch of corruption (6/day, 5d6)
name: Gnoll Ravager
creature_subtype: Advanced Player's Guide 118CE Medium humanoid gnoll
